markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Healer's Gel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1007)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catalyst" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=396" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 168 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="" /><row>Cast a Spell</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

An astringent aroma from rare succulent plants wafts off these soothing cloth patches. Adding this material component to a [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) spell bestows additional temporary Hit Points to one target healed by the spell. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Healer's Gel (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 168 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The spell grants 5 temporary Hit Points.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Healer's Gel (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 168 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 125 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The spell grants 10 temporary Hit Points.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 13"
pfs="Standard"
>
Healer's Gel (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 168 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The spell grants 15 temporary Hit Points.
name: Healer's Gel
